verbs.description: The cannabis industry [V: could] be a federal tax windfall — provided the Trump Administration does n't stamp it out .
[ARG1: The cannabis industry] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: be] [ARG2: a federal tax windfall] — [ARGM-ADV: provided the Trump Administration does n't stamp it out] .
The cannabis industry could be a federal tax windfall — [V: provided] [ARG1: the Trump Administration does n't stamp it out] .
The cannabis industry could be a federal tax windfall — provided the Trump Administration [V: does] n't stamp it out .
The cannabis industry could be a federal tax windfall — provided [ARG0: the Trump Administration] does [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: stamp] [ARG1: it] out .
